files.description: Main landing page with envelope animation, countdown timer, and navigation to all Valentine's Week days
Rose Day page with animated blooming rose, falling petals, and interactive bouquet collection
Propose Day page with ring box animation and the playful escaping 'No' button feature
Chocolate Day page with interactive chocolate box that opens and displays love messages for each chocolate
Teddy Day page with an animated CSS teddy bear, hug counter, and teddy collection
Promise Day page with animated pinky promise, sealable promise cards, and a certificate
Hug Day page with animated hugging couple, virtual hug button with warmth meter
Grand Valentine's Day finale page with love letter, 14 reasons, timeline, and celebration effects
